title: Main export partners for Japan 2017
summary: The chart shows that United_States has the highest Share of Japan total with 50/100 being on their Japan .
Hong_Kong holds 5.1 % of the Japan total , followed by Thailand with 4.2
South_Korea and China both have 4.2 total in the Japan partners .
gold: The statistic shows the main export partners for Japan in 2017 . In 2017 , the most important export partner for Japan were the United States , accounting for 19.4 percent of all exports .
